channel.title: Systems on MEMO
channel.description: Recent content in Systems on MEMO

item.description: 2. misc 3) scripts cnameList=($(docker ps --format "{{.Names}}")) midx=1 mtot=${#cnameList[*]} for cname in ${cnameList[*]}; do cpid=($(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' ${cname})) cport=$(netstat -ntpl | grep ${cpid} | awk '{ gsub(":::", "", $4); print $4 }') if [[ -z "${cport}" ]]; then cport=$(docker inspect --format '{{.HostConfig.PortBindings}}' ${cname}) fi ccmd=$(docker inspect --format '{{.Config.Cmd}}' ${cname}) if [[ -n "${cport}" ]] || [[ "${ccmd}" != "null" ]]; then echo "# [${midx}/${mtot}] ${cname}" echo " - pid: ${cpid}" echo " - listen port: ${cport}" echo " - command: ${ccmd}" fi let "midx = midx + 1" done 2) docker build Dockerfile 설정 cat << EOF > images/java-app/Dockerfile FROM localhost:5000/amazoncorretto:8-alpine-jdk-with-curl WORKDIR /service COPY .
